name: The Seinfeld Chronicles Trivia Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What restaurant are Jerry and George at in the very beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Pete's.

	Pete's Restaurant was later changed to the more friendly and well-known restaurant, Monk's.  This is the only episode featuring Pete's.

questions.text: What is the name of the waitress who works at the restaurant?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	Claire was dropped from the show because she was considered boring.  She was originally placed in the cast to give the boys help at some times.

Michigan.

	Jerry met Laura when he was performing stand-up in Michigan, and now Laura is staying in New York for a seminar.

questions.text: What is Kramer's name during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Kessler.

	It is later revealed that in the place of Kramer's name on the lobby's buzzers, the name Kessler still remains.  The name was changed to Kramer because Jerry felt that it fit the character more.

questions.text: What team is Jerry watching on TV the first time we see his apartment?
questions.explanation:
Mets.

	Jerry had taped the game and was trying to watch it, but Kessler told him how it ends.  Jerry's apartment is much different than most people know it because the walls are a different colour, the couch is different, and the cupboards are empty.

questions.text: What type of animal does "Kramer" have in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	Kessler's dog only appears in this episode.  He runs in and jumps on George before drinking from Jerry's toilet.

questions.text: What is George's occupation in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Real Estate Agent.

	Kessler asks George about real estate, but they don't delve into a large conversation about it.  George remains a real estate agent for a little while before getting his permanent job.

questions.text: What do Laura and Jerry drink when Laura stays over?
questions.explanation:
Wine.

	Laura asks to stay over at Jerry's for a second night, but Jerry soon discovers that Laura is engaged.

questions.text: Where does Laura want to take a boat tour?
questions.explanation:
Manhattan.

	Laura says that although the idea is a bit touristic, she wants to take a five-hour boat tour with Jerry around Manhattan.  Jerry seems less than thrilled by the idea.

questions.text: Does Elaine appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After a request from NBC, Elaine was added to the cast in the second episode entitled "Male Unbonding".
